amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities And Villages; Laws Applicable To More Than One And Less Than All Classes
amendatorysection.catchline: Villages; cancel contract with county; effect.
amendatorysection.para: Any village entering into a contract pursuant to section 19-3801 may serve notice of its intention to cancel such contract after such contract has been in force for one year. Upon cancellation, such village shall provide its own police services.
